doc.name: ExecutionResponsePort
doc.description: This actor implements an output port in a CompositeExecutionAspect (@link CompositeExecutionAspect). This actor simply stores the token from the input and provides methods to access the token. A token in this port is a RecordToken containing an actor object and the execution time of this actor. The meaning is that the actor can resume execution. The CompositeExecutionAspect calls these methods.
doc.author: Patricia Derler
